en.title: PD Jankij's Recognition Event, Bangkok, 12th October 2008.
en.content:
Recently, Presidential Director Jankij held his own Recognition Event on 12th October, 2008 at the Mahisorn Hall, SCB Park in Bangkok. It was attended by more than 800 of his distributors in the auditorium. The capacity crowd brought sparks into the air as they cheered every leader who went onto the stage to receive their pins and awards.Distributors from all major provinces in Thailand attended the inaugural event.

FE would like to congratulate all the 8 PDs, 5 EDs and 48 Directors who were recognized on that day although 85 Directors qualified.  Well done all of you!

VIPs from Malaysia who attended the event were Mr KS Lee, FE Founder Director, Mr Foo Kok Keong, World Badminton Champion and one of FE's Spokesman, PD KC Phoon and PD Alex Long. General Banjong Koomeechai (Royal Thailand Navy) was also there to grace the event.

MCs Miss Punyawee Sukkulwarased (from Thailand Live TV Channel 3 Program) and FE Leader Mr Vichean Jamwanna presided. Thank you for your great MCeeing!

Highlights Of The Event Include:

- Dance and Drum Performances

- Opening Speech by Mr KS Lee. Thank you Mr KS Lee for a great speech, as always.

- Leaders speech by PD Jankij Kaewroonkumand and his wife PD Thapanee Sukkasem. Both leaders    gave a great and emotional speech. PD Jankij's message was he was not very successful in all the    MLM companies he was in for more than 15 years until he found FE. Now PD Jankij has found huge    success in FE! Long Live FE!

- Motivational speech by PD KC Phoon.  KC got the crowd inspired and cheering towards the end! He    also demonstrated the amazing energy from FE's Quantum Pendant. See all of you at the TOP!

- Speech by PD Alex Long. Thank you Alex. You have made it!

- Testimonial sharing by Mr Foo Kok Keong. Thank you Mr Foo for your amazing testimonials.

- Presentation of awards and pins to all the Directors, EDs and PDs.

- ED Mr Somsak Thamsirimongkol and wife ED Ms Phetchara shared their success story. Most   amazing was Ms Phetchara who was wheel chair bound for the last 5 years because of polio and   rheumatoid arthritis. After using our Quantum Pendant for 1 month, she was able to walk and after   6 months, she was dancing on the stage at this event to the amazement of everyone!

- Video presentations of all PDs. All the PDs shared their success stories. Truly inspiring!

This is the first of many recognition events in the future. FE would like to thank PD Jankij and all leaders for organizing this successful event which culminated with loud cheers from all the distributors. Well Done Everyone!

meta.description:
Recently, Presidential Director Jankij held his own Recognition Event on 12th October, 2008 at the Mahisorn Hall, SCB Park in Bangkok. It was attended by more than 800 of his distributors in the auditorium. The capacity crowd brought sparks into the air as they cheered every leader who went onto the stage to receive their pins and awards.Distributors from all major provinces in Thailand attended the inaugural event.
FE would like to congratulate all the 8 PDs, 5EDs and 48 Directors who were recognised on that day although 85 Directors qualified. Well done all of you!
VIPs from Malaysia who attended the event were Mr KS Lee, FE Founder Director, Mr Foo Kok Keong, World Badminton Champion and one of FE's Spokesman, PD KC Phoon and PD Alex Long. General Banjong Koomeechai (Royal Thailand Navy) was also there to grace the event.
MCs Miss Punyawee Sukkulwarased (from Thailand Live TV Channel 3 Program) and FE Leader Mr Vichean Jamwanna presided. Thank you for your great MCeeing!
Highlights of the event include:
- Dance and drum performances
- Opening speech by Mr KS Lee. Thank you Mr KS Lee for a great speech, as always.
- Leaders speech by PD Jankij Kaewroonkumand and his wife PD Thapanee Sukkasem. Both leaders gave a great and emotional speech. PD Jankij's message was he was not very successful in all the MLM companies he was in for more than 15 years until he found FE. Now PD Jankij has found huge success in FE! Long Live FE!
- Motivational speech by PD KC Phoon. KC got the crowd inspired and cheering towards the end! He also demonstrated the amazing energy from FE's Quantum Pendant. See all of you at the TOP!
- Speech by PD Alex Long. Thank you Alex. You have made it!
- Testimonial sharing by Mr Foo Kok Keong. Thank you Mr Foo for your amazing testimonials.
- Presentation of awards and pins to all the Directors, EDs and PDs.
- ED Mr Somsak Thamsirimongkol and wife ED Ms Phetchara shared their success story. Most amazing was Ms Phetchara who was wheel chair bound for the last 5 years because of polio and rheumatoid arthritis. After using our Quantum Pendant for 1 month, she was able to walk and after 6 months, she was dancing on the stage at this event to the amazement of everyone!
- Video presentations of all PDs. All the PDs shared their success stories. Truly inspiring!
This is the first of many recognition events in the future. FE would like to thank PD Jankij and all leaders for organizing this successful event which culminated with loud cheers from all the distributors. Well Done Everyone!
